events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's request for a refund has been identified and categorized under the refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in refund requests for further handling.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you want to request a refund. I’m here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and a brief explanation of why the item is unsatisfactory for the refund?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. The item color is completely different from the picture, so I cannot use it.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request and you will receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help with processing the refund promptly.
The refund case has been resolved successfully and the payment process is confirmed on our side.
Checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further communication, we are closing this refund request case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback regarding your experience with our refund process.
